annotations.description: Unique identifier for this chat. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for this chat. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this chat. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: Type of chat, can be either 'private', 'group', 'supergroup' or 'channel'
annotations.html_description: Type of chat, can be either “private”, “group”, “supergroup” or “channel”
annotations.rst_description: Type of chat, can be either 'private', 'group', 'supergroup' or 'channel'
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Title, for supergroups, channels and group chats
annotations.html_description: Optional. Title, for supergroups, channels and group chats
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Title, for supergroups, channels and group chats
annotations.name: title

annotations.description: Username, for private chats, supergroups and channels if available
annotations.html_description: Optional. Username, for private chats, supergroups and channels if available
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Username, for private chats, supergroups and channels if available
annotations.name: username

annotations.description: First name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. First name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. First name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.name: first_name

annotations.description: Last name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. Last name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Last name of the other party in a private chat
annotations.name: last_name

annotations.description: True, if the supergroup chat is a forum (has topics enabled)
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the supergroup chat is a forum (has topics enabled)
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the supergroup chat is a forum (has `topics <https://telegram.org/blog/topics-in-groups-collectible-usernames#topics-in-groups>`_ enabled)
annotations.name: is_forum

annotations.description: Chat photo. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Chat photo. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Chat photo. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: photo

annotations.description: If non-empty, the list of all active chat usernames; for private chats, supergroups and channels. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. If non-empty, the list of all active chat usernames; for private chats, supergroups and channels. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. If non-empty, the list of all `active chat usernames <https://telegram.org/blog/topics-in-groups-collectible-usernames#collectible-usernames>`_; for private chats, supergroups and channels. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: active_usernames

annotations.description: List of available reactions allowed in the chat. If omitted, then all emoji reactions are allowed. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. List of available reactions allowed in the chat. If omitted, then all emoji reactions are allowed. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. List of available reactions allowed in the chat. If omitted, then all `emoji reactions <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#reactiontypeemoji>`_ are allowed. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: available_reactions

annotations.description: Identifier of the accent color for the chat name and backgrounds of the chat photo, reply header, and link preview. See accent colors for more details. Returned only in getChat. Always returned in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Identifier of the accent color for the chat name and backgrounds of the chat photo, reply header, and link preview. See accent colors for more details. Returned only in getChat. Always returned in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Identifier of the accent color for the chat name and backgrounds of the chat photo, reply header, and link preview. See `accent colors <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#accent-colors>`_ for more details. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`. Always returned in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: accent_color_id

annotations.description: Custom emoji identifier of emoji chosen by the chat for the reply header and link preview background. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Custom emoji identifier of emoji chosen by the chat for the reply header and link preview background. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Custom emoji identifier of emoji chosen by the chat for the reply header and link preview background. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: background_custom_emoji_id

annotations.description: Identifier of the accent color for the chat's profile background. See profile accent colors for more details. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Identifier of the accent color for the chat's profile background. See profile accent colors for more details. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Identifier of the accent color for the chat's profile background. See `profile accent colors <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#profile-accent-colors>`_ for more details. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: profile_accent_color_id

annotations.description: Custom emoji identifier of the emoji chosen by the chat for its profile background. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji chosen by the chat for its profile background. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji chosen by the chat for its profile background. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: profile_background_custom_emoji_id

annotations.description: Custom emoji identifier of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Custom emoji identifier of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.

annotations.description: Expiration date of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat, in Unix time, if any. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Expiration date of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat, in Unix time, if any. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Expiration date of the emoji status of the chat or the other party in a private chat, in Unix time, if any. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: emoji_status_expiration_date

annotations.description: Bio of the other party in a private chat. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Bio of the other party in a private chat. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Bio of the other party in a private chat. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: bio

annotations.description: True, if privacy settings of the other party in the private chat allows to use tg://user?id=<user_id> links only in chats with the user. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if privacy settings of the other party in the private chat allows to use tg://user?id=<user_id> links only in chats with the user. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if privacy settings of the other party in the private chat allows to use :code:`tg://user?id=<user_id>` links only in chats with the user. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: has_private_forwards

annotations.description: True, if the privacy settings of the other party restrict sending voice and video note messages in the private chat. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the privacy settings of the other party restrict sending voice and video note messages in the private chat. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the privacy settings of the other party restrict sending voice and video note messages in the private chat. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: has_restricted_voice_and_video_messages

annotations.description: True, if users need to join the supergroup before they can send messages. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if users need to join the supergroup before they can send messages. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if users need to join the supergroup before they can send messages. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: join_to_send_messages

annotations.description: True, if all users directly joining the supergroup need to be approved by supergroup administrators. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if all users directly joining the supergroup need to be approved by supergroup administrators. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if all users directly joining the supergroup need to be approved by supergroup administrators. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: join_by_request

annotations.description: Description, for groups, supergroups and channel chats. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Description, for groups, supergroups and channel chats. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Description, for groups, supergroups and channel chats. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: description

annotations.description: Primary invite link, for groups, supergroups and channel chats. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Primary invite link, for groups, supergroups and channel chats. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Primary invite link, for groups, supergroups and channel chats. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: invite_link

annotations.description: The most recent pinned message (by sending date). Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. The most recent pinned message (by sending date). Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The most recent pinned message (by sending date). Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: pinned_message

annotations.description: Default chat member permissions, for groups and supergroups. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Default chat member permissions, for groups and supergroups. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Default chat member permissions, for groups and supergroups. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: permissions

annotations.description: For supergroups, the minimum allowed delay between consecutive messages sent by each unprivileged user; in seconds. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, the minimum allowed delay between consecutive messages sent by each unprivileged user; in seconds. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, the minimum allowed delay between consecutive messages sent by each unprivileged user; in seconds. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: slow_mode_delay

annotations.description: For supergroups, the minimum number of boosts that a non-administrator user needs to add in order to ignore slow mode and chat permissions. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, the minimum number of boosts that a non-administrator user needs to add in order to ignore slow mode and chat permissions. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, the minimum number of boosts that a non-administrator user needs to add in order to ignore slow mode and chat permissions. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: unrestrict_boost_count

annotations.description: The time after which all messages sent to the chat will be automatically deleted; in seconds. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. The time after which all messages sent to the chat will be automatically deleted; in seconds. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The time after which all messages sent to the chat will be automatically deleted; in seconds. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: message_auto_delete_time

annotations.description: True, if aggressive anti-spam checks are enabled in the supergroup. The field is only available to chat administrators. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if aggressive anti-spam checks are enabled in the supergroup. The field is only available to chat administrators. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if aggressive anti-spam checks are enabled in the supergroup. The field is only available to chat administrators. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: has_aggressive_anti_spam_enabled

annotations.description: True, if non-administrators can only get the list of bots and administrators in the chat. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if non-administrators can only get the list of bots and administrators in the chat. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if non-administrators can only get the list of bots and administrators in the chat. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: has_hidden_members

annotations.description: True, if messages from the chat can't be forwarded to other chats. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if messages from the chat can't be forwarded to other chats. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if messages from the chat can't be forwarded to other chats. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: has_protected_content

annotations.description: True, if new chat members will have access to old messages; available only to chat administrators. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if new chat members will have access to old messages; available only to chat administrators. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if new chat members will have access to old messages; available only to chat administrators. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: has_visible_history

annotations.description: For supergroups, name of group sticker set. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, name of group sticker set. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, name of group sticker set. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: sticker_set_name

annotations.description: True, if the bot can change the group sticker set. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can change the group sticker set. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the bot can change the group sticker set. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: can_set_sticker_set

annotations.description: For supergroups, the name of the group's custom emoji sticker set. Custom emoji from this set can be used by all users and bots in the group. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, the name of the group's custom emoji sticker set. Custom emoji from this set can be used by all users and bots in the group. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, the name of the group's custom emoji sticker set. Custom emoji from this set can be used by all users and bots in the group. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: custom_emoji_sticker_set_name

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the linked chat, i.e. the discussion group identifier for a channel and vice versa; for supergroups and channel chats. This identifier may be greater than 32 bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it is smaller than 52 bits, so a signed 64 bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unique identifier for the linked chat, i.e. the discussion group identifier for a channel and vice versa; for supergroups and channel chats. This identifier may be greater than 32 bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it is smaller than 52 bits, so a signed 64 bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unique identifier for the linked chat, i.e. the discussion group identifier for a channel and vice versa; for supergroups and channel chats. This identifier may be greater than 32 bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it is smaller than 52 bits, so a signed 64 bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: linked_chat_id

annotations.description: For supergroups, the location to which the supergroup is connected. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.html_description: Optional. For supergroups, the location to which the supergroup is connected. Returned only in getChat.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For supergroups, the location to which the supergroup is connected. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_chat.GetChat`.
annotations.name: location
